mama adahas karanne giman, nirogi pudgalayek, paya dolahak go eetath wada wathurawath nathuwa niraharawa indima balapanne kohomada kiyana eka.
ohu mata karadarayak wana thana mama sara kalemi.
“honda welawata mama prathikarawalata yomu wune dokta...
'amma' hamba wenakotath amma leda wana duka, amma marena duka, amma gen banum ahana aadi duk no winda innawa kiyana mattama karanna puluwan deyak nemeyi.
“sar mata wihilu karanawa.”
dan loku sambandhatha na.
ada eya kalanurupawa wenaswi warthamanayata uchitha aakarayata dinen dina wenas wemin, maha dewa mangalyayak lesa pawathwe.

bambalapitiya, siri wajiraramaya poda perawaru 6.00 – 7.15 sil samadan karawima anushasanawa saha buddha pujawa, siri wajiraramadhipathi rajakiya panditha thrikunamale aananda anu na himi, 8.00 – 9.00 dharmanushasanawa, siri wajirarama wasi pitipana shasanarathana himi, 9.00 – 9.30 wishesha dharmanushasanawa aggamaha panditha waligama nyanarathana mahanahimi, 9.30 – 11.00 bhawanawa saha anushasanawa gampaha pasaditha himi, 11.00 – 11.15 buddha pujawa parakumpura wisharada himi, paswaru 12.30 – 1.30 sethpirith saha theruwan guna sajjhayanawa siri wajirarama daham pasal pradhanacharya kambaurugamuwe mahanaga himi, 1.30 – 2.30 dharma sakachchawa panditha waligepola silawansha himi, 3.00 – 4.00 dharmanushasanawa siri wajiranynyana dharmayathanawasi diyathalawe piyadhassi himi, 4.00 – 5.00 gihi deshanawa kaliponiya rajyaye wishwawidyalaye hitapu ingashrisi ha bhasha sahithya upadeshaka aacharya rawindranath mahatha, 5.00 – 6.00 dharma deshanaya – rajakiya panditha thalalle chandakiththi himi, 6.00 – 6.30 atawisi buddha pujawa saha sil aluth kirima siri wajirarama swamin wahansela.
